title: Optics - Focal length of converging lens

content.question: In which of the following ranges is the focal point of the lens?

choices.label: Between <math alttext="0 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> and <math alttext="5 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math>

Between <math alttext="5 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> and <math alttext="10 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math>

Between <math alttext="10 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> and <math alttext="15 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math>

Between <math alttext="15 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> and <math alttext="20 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math>

content.answer: Between <math alttext="10 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> and <math alttext="15 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
